answers.answer: Call your doctor asap. Could be signs of preeclampsia; high bp, swelling, visual disturbances, headaches etc. I was just in hospital overnight being monitored for it.
It may just be that you need rest or you're dehydrated but it is always better to check with the professionals. Why put yourself or baby at risk. Hope all works out to be okay.
Drink plenty of water and put your feet up. Call your doctor immediately. They may send you to L&D for monitoring.
Thanks ladies this is all something new to me

question: So last night I checked my blood pressure and it was 162/111 and I didn't have a head ache or anything and now this morning I'm feeling a little out of it it's like I'm seeing little sparkles and stuff what should I do? Scared a little
title: Blood Pressure
